instruction: Cook brown rice according to package directions.
Chop onion, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, zucchini, and yellow squash into small pieces.
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add chopped vegetables and corn to skillet and cook until tender-crisp.
Stir in taco seasoning and cook for 1 minute.
Warm tortillas according to package directions.
To assemble burritos, spread a layer of rice on a tortilla, followed by black beans, grilled vegetables, avocado, salsa, sour cream, and cheese.
Fold sides of tortilla into center and roll up tightly.
